price: 105. Y no sean como quienes se dividieron y discreparon entre sí (los judíos y los cristianos) tras haber recibido pruebas evidentes. Esos tendrán un terrible castigo
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ تَفَرَّقُواْ وَٱخۡتَلَفُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna tafarraqū wa-ikh'talafū min baʿdi mā jāahumu al-bayinātu wa-ulāika lahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
